attributes.action: Send James Milner to the World Cup in Russia (to be played in CM)
attributes.additional_details: He needs to be on that plane pure and simple.
attributes.background: James Milner may be boring, but he's so consistent at it. That's not all he's consistent at. He's consistent at football. He Is versatile, he is experienced, assured, has the most assist in the CL this year, and he can take a penalty. He needs to be on that plane pure and simple.
